job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer who is passionate and has cybersecurity experience. The incumbent will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs, presenting to clients and more.
Duties and Responsibilities
Interpret business requirements and technical specifications
Design APIs to encompass service functionality
Perform coding to technical specifications
Investigate, analyze and document reported defects
Perform maintenance programming and correction of identified defects
Create and document and implement unit test plans, scripts, and test harnesses
Create and maintain technical documentation using defined technical documentation templates
Participate in brainstorm sessions with the team
Co-lead presentations, demo our software and answer client questions
Performs related duties as assigned
Skills / Attributes Required
Minimum of 5 years experience
Substantial experience in C/C++ and C#
Multithreading (concurrent) programming abilities
System-level application/services programming experience
Knowledge of database architecture and design
Strong object-oriented programming skills and design patterns
Internationalization experience is a plus
Good communication skills, team player and cooperative
Ability to interpret requirements and technical specifications.
Ability to code software according to published standards and design guidelines.
Flexible attitude, ability to perform under pressure.
A commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the work.
Ability to work well within a team
Ability to work with minimal supervision
